oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Teaching Veterinary Pathology and Therapeutics in the Next Decade
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Davis, Lloyd E.
Aronson, Arthur L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: teaching
veterinary pharmacology
veterinary therapeutics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have asked four prominent veterinary educators to provide their perceptions of how we adjust our approaches to the teaching of veterinary pharmacology and therapeutics in our professional and graduate programs to accomodate these changes. Their discussions follow this introduction to the session.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Fifth Biennial Symposium; 265
